title: Reschedule a Postponed Game
description: A football match is postponed due to severe weather. A league administrator must find a new date for the game that works for both teams and the broadcaster.

tasks.description: Identify the postponed game and retrieve the schedules for both involved teams.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies all existing commitments for both teams.

tasks.description: Find all mutually available dates within the league's designated rescheduling window.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies three potential dates for the rescheduled match.

tasks.description: Check the broadcast partner's schedule to ensure they can air the game on one of the potential dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the broadcaster is available on one of the three dates.

tasks.description: Update the official league schedule with the new game date and notify both teams and the broadcaster.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully reschedules the game and sends notifications.
